subSections.title: Chinese
subSections.text:
{{zh-forms|s=搀|alt=摻-"to mix" +
"to support by the arm"}}

subSections.title: Definitions
subSections.text:
{{zh-hanzi}}

# {{†}} to [[stab]]; to [[insert]]
# {{†}} [[sharp]]
# to [[mix]] ({{n-g|same as}} {{zh-l|摻}})
# to [[support]] by the [[arm]]
# {{†}} to [[take]] by [[force]]; to [[seize]]

subSections.title: Usage notes
subSections.text: In Mainland China, use of the character {{zh-l|摻}} to mean "to mix" (instead of {{lang|zh|攙}}) is recommended  by the ''{{w|The First Series of Standardized Forms of Words with Non-standardized Variant Forms}}'' ({{w2|zh|pref=《|第一批异形词整理表|suf=》}}) and ''{{w|Xiandai Hanyu Guifan Cidian}}'' ({{w2|zh|pref=《|现代汉语规范词典|suf=》}}).

subSections.title: Compounds
subSections.text: {{zh-der|攙雜|攙合|攙和|攙夥|攙越|攙言接語|攙先|打攙|攙口|攙空|攙話接舌|攙兌|攙扶婆|攙扶|攙行奪市|攙親|攙假|攙放|攙奪|長攙攙}}
